website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an alternative to the classic fidget spinners, this is one to consider. It offers challenging spinning action that we think you'll enjoy once you get the hang of it.
pros: Distances itself from others on our list for having dual pendulums that deliver different spinning motions
Made of stainless steel with a fairly weighty build
cons: Takes some time to learn to spin it correctly
Some spinners arrived unbalanced, and a few had rusted bearings

customer_reviews.title: As good as I've seen from ANY spinner or fidget item!
customer_reviews.text: Having bought quite a few Fidget Spinners and Gadgets lately, I can confidently say the Chaos Finger Gyro is the best packaged, best produced, and most Entertaining item I've received!!! I would highly recommend this item based on the one I received. Great weight, balance, and hours of enjoyment! I hope this helps you guys!!!
customer_reviews.author: StevenSS

customer_reviews.title: Chaotic motion, not just a spinner.
customer_reviews.text: If what you want is something you can mindlessly spin, this is not it. A so-called fidget spinner is just one wheel and it just spins. Fun enough but this toy is more dynamic. Hold the large circles and let the arm swing loose. Get just the right motion going and you have what physicists call chaotic motion, with momentum exchanged between the large and small arm in unpredictable ways. This one has a learning curve! I found it's most interesting when walking, as the walking motion translates to circular motion. Well made of what I believe to be stainless steel with quality bearings.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Rubenzahl

customer_reviews.title: Neat little fidget spinner, works great.
customer_reviews.text: My son has ADHD & needs to do something with his hands. He was getting bored of regular fidget spinners so he started clicking the battery cover for the remote off & on. It drove me nuts so I wanted to find a different type of fidget spinner for him. I came across this 1 & thought it would be neat because it spins in 2 different spots. He was really excited when he got it in the mail & tries different ways to get it to spin. It spins good & isn't noisy while spinning like his other one. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SaraB

customer_reviews.title: Lopsided spin by design leaves spin time short
customer_reviews.text: While the concept is kind of cool, execution and expectations fell a little short for me on this one. It is very smooth on both axis, and can keep you occupied for a while, the problem for me was length of time on spin. Way too short... and the reason is that by its design it is a lopsided spin. And you feel it. And because its lopsided when spun it slows down rapidly which for me makes using it not very satisfying. You may be different as we all are and maybe enjoy it. For me it's a nice addition to the collection.
customer_reviews.author: Casey F in SF

customer_reviews.title: Not For Small Hands!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. From the minute you pick it up, you will realize that you are holding a well built, sturdy product. I like it. Unfortunately, I have small hands, and it's challenging to use by holding it with my thumb and forefinger. This toy bumps into my hand, which interferes with the spinning action. It works a little better if I use it between my thumb and middle finger, but I still experience the same problem. I'm providing this information as a help to other small-handed people who are considering purchasing the Anti-Anxiety Fidget Spinner.
customer_reviews.author: Kudzu

customer_reviews.title: It's...okay
customer_reviews.text: Notice that a lot of the recent 5 star reviews sound the same (same writing style and whatnot)? Seems that way to me! Hmmm. Anyway. I got this with 2 other fidget toys, and this ranks #3 on the list. It's an interesting twist on the standard fidget spinner. It seems sturdy and has a good weight. It has a smooth quiet glide. The machined edges almost feel a little sharp. It's hard to get a smooth consistent spin on it, so it's not super satisfying. It is kinda fun to get the little bearing going. I doubt it will get much use beyond a quick 30 second test from time to time. But...oh well, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Krixee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this thing...  it is so quiet that
customer_reviews.text: ... you can play with it in Church during a sermon...! Seriously though, I use an Infinity Cube to fidget with at my desk but during those times I can't make any noise whatsoever, this thing is amazingly quiet... I mean, DEAD SILENT and the counterweight action gives a different pattern every time. I was against fidget spinners from the start but this one is perfect. It is small too. Fits in your pocket and only feels like a few quarters in there. I also use it for Air travel, DMV lines, etc. -- Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Don Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: Solid Design!
customer_reviews.text: I have anxiety and always need to have something to fidget with. This fits the bill and keeps my hands occupied to allow me to focus on what I need to be doing. This would be great for kids who have trouble focusing too. I'm happy with the design and feel like it's made really well!
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfying
customer_reviews.text: I'm an adult, so one thing I appreciate about this is the aesthetic. The design looks nice and it doesn't look or feel like a toy. This might be worth considering if you are self conscious of using something like this in public. However it is fun to play with (which is the most important aspect). The stainless steel has some heft and it feels good just sitting in my hand. The design allows multiple ways to manipulate it. The pendulum motions are satisfyingly complex. I can't think of any ways it could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Better then I expected.
customer_reviews.text: When I seen this spinner I knew it was so cool and different. So I ordered it just got it and it is amazing better then I expected can’t put it down. I have many types of spinners from gear to cube. I love them all but I have to say this is going to be by fair my favorite. If your looking for something different then a normal fast spinner this is the perfect one for you
customer_reviews.author: Meg's

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is undoubtedly the best fidget spinner I have ever seen. I think that the original style spinner is extremely lame and unexciting, but this. THIS. I was hesitant to spend the money, but once I received it and hours spent fidgeting, I am considering buying many more for work, friends, family, etc. The build quality is excellent and flawless. I am constantly fidgeting and messing with things and this is just perfect. I dont care if you can spin something on your finger for 7 minutes and 34 seconds, this is entertaining FOREVER.
customer_reviews.author: nada

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made spinner with double hub.
customer_reviews.text: Cool little gadget. Reminds me of one of the metal toys with the balls that used to knock together in patterns. I guess those were the original desk fidget toys. This one is designed for grown fingers and is especially cool on a flat surface (as I’ve demonstrate). The double spoke type action makes it even more interesting. I’m going to drop a bit of lock oil in at the friction points to see how fast/long I can really get it to spin. Even comes in a nice clothe gift bag for storage, with instructions, no less! It’s a fun little toy and will make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: HawksNest

customer_reviews.title: Decent spinner
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent fidget toy. It has a little less weight than I expected, and it is perhaps not as solid as one would have hoped for the price. It is a nice twist on a fidget spinner, as having a joint in the middle of the arm tends to make the arm swing in unexpected moments. It is too big for my fingers, and my daughters fingers to hold without the spinner part swinging back around and hitting our fingers. It is a good size for my husband. 3/5 stars since he still likes it despite the lower quality. Would have gotten 4/5 stars if it weren't too big for me and my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Ashli R.

customer_reviews.title: A more interesting spinner. Very creative
customer_reviews.text: Ironically I originally posted a 3 star review but I'm updating this. I felt the unbalanced aspect of it was a negative. I had given this as a gift to my brother in law. It had actually become one of his favorite spinners because it was a challenge to him and it actually made it more fun for him. He found it really interesting how it rotated and it was fun for him to try and get it to move certain ways (hard to explain lol)
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This thing looked cool. Thought it would have some cool balanced / counter balanced motion. It didn’t. No weight to it at all. Just a flimsy hunk of stuff thrown together with no thought to the weights, mechanics or feel. Purely cosmetic. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: mswlogo

customer_reviews.title: Got this to try to understand what the big deal ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this to try to understand what the big deal is about fidget spinners. Having received this and trying it out, I still don't understand the popularity. This particular spinner is made of stainless steel with little ball bearings to aid in spinning. It comes in a little presentation box and to be honest appears to be made extremely well. Fit and finish is spot on. I will give it to one of my grandchildren as I got nothing out of trying.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Remote Saver
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why this thing costs as much as it does, and I was pretty miffed when my son lost it faster than it took for me to buy it on Amazon (thankfully, we found it again!), but it's an EXCELLENT fidget and my son's favorite. Not only is it completely quiet, but you can take it apart (and put back together). I guess it's actually saving us money because he no longer takes apart the TV remotes, flashlights, and pens around the house (none of which go back together nearly as well as this fidget!).
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Solid material, nice spin.  Compact & Fun.
customer_reviews.text: Solid material used and nice little bearings, make for a smooth fidget toy that will keep you coming back to it. The feeling generated helps me escape whatever issues I may or may not be dealing with. Very fun, actually. I have both versions, and they’re both good quality and do what they’re described to do (in my opinion). If I had to choose one, I’d probably go with the updated version, but both are enjoyable, and the original version is capable of being more ‘compact’ in your pocket w/ the single pendulum.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bull

customer_reviews.title: Comes apart very easily making it almost impossible to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's a defect or if they all come apart this easily, but the two "arms" holding the second (smaller) bearing in place separate quite easily to the point where you can only hold the spinner upright in one direction (holding it with the other side upwards makes the arms separate/fall apart and the smaller bearing comes out). This also makes it impossible to spin it quickly or else the whole thing will fall apart. The spinner is cool when it works though.
customer_reviews.author: susanhill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It looks very slick and it is designed to please the eye. It feels kinda awkward to try and spin both parts, but if you focus more on watching it spin rather than how awkward it feels, it becomes very mesmerizing. It DOES make noise, but it is very minimal, so I personally am not too bothered or concerned about this. It's pretty simple to master too, making it a great gift for kids. My little brother has autism and he enjoys playing with this.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful spinner.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Rotablade Pendulum (sold it for what I paid for it, which was more than 10 times the price of this spinner) and this one is a very good replica. The dimensions are the same, the weight is slightly heavier, the bearings are good, and the overall effect, which is quite interesting, is the same as the original from Rotablade. Whoever makes this does an excellent job. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun but could be better made
customer_reviews.text: The main ball bearing in the part you hold is unfortunately not very good. Also, it seemed to have no lubrication at all when I got it and was surprisingly noisy, but a little drop of machine oil fixed that. The double pendulum is much better as a fidget toy than a standard spinner though, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: Be careful not to loose it!
customer_reviews.text: Great spinner/gadget/toy. I carried it with me everywhere for the first two days after I got it. It’s very fun to watch, or just to spin it in one hand while doing whatever else. But because it was with me everywhere, i don’t know where I left it, now I’m going crazy without it, because it’s small size is making it impossible to find!
customer_reviews.author: Compositions

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for Autistic Child (once you use glue)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my autistic 12 year old son, he normally destroys most fidget spinners within 3minutes and this one he found the flaw within 20 seconds. The spinners main piece unscrews- BUT i put 3 drops of gorilla glue in and tightened it and let it dry. It was PERFECT after that! This was the best present and his favorite thing out of all the xmas gifts he got :)
customer_reviews.author: Catherine R.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Fidget!
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite fidget toy and I carry it everywhere. I enjoy the one handed nature; holding between thumb and index finger you can spin by flicking your wrist, or using middle finger to propel the pendulum. The chaotic motion makes for interesting sensation of the forces on the toy and keeps me entertained better than a common spinner. Update: 9/6/18 First one I received had an issue, but Seller quickly sent me a new replacement which works fine. This is still my favorite fidget.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Simple device with subtle complexity
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the simple complexity of this device, as well as its compact size. I initially had an issue with the unit, but the seller contacted me proactively and arranged immediate replacement. Would definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It spins!
customer_reviews.text: I hold this and spin it. The bearings are quite smooth. However tolerances are loose for main bearing which allows lateral wobble. Still a neat toy. I hold it up to show my dogs with a feral grin. They are strangely frightened of it. I hope they will grow accustomed with continued exposure.
customer_reviews.author: michael harris

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after two days
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fidget. It’s fun to play with. However, on the first day of using it in my office, I dropped it (on a carpeted floor from a sitting position) and it came apart. I put it back together with no problem, but after that it kept coming apart again just from playing with it. By the second day, it simply wouldn’t stay together at all. Very disappointing. I’m returning it. It’s not cheap for a fidget, and should last more than two days.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Saul

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Came out of the box in pieces. Fell apart after using it once. Low quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Unique design adds additional interest
customer_reviews.text: Although its expensive, it is very cool. The combination of the light weight titanium used in the short articulating arm and the super low friction ball bears give this gadget a feeling of being alive as you play with it. The larger arm moves as expected, as you tilt one way or another it moves in that direction, but the smaller arm seems to have a life of its own. This give the toy a bit more interest than the run of the mill fidget toy. My son loves it, and I want to borrow it.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Roast

customer_reviews.title: At first glance.....
customer_reviews.text: At first, after receiving this spinner, I thought that I would not like it. It didn't look like it would be that fun to play with, but after unboxing and carrying it withme for the last few days my opinion has changed 100%. This thing is a blast. There are so may different ways to spin it and do rhythmic tricks. I would highly recommend this fidget spinner. It is very well built and worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea @ GYCT Designs

customer_reviews.title: Fun fidget
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun fidget toy. Spins smoothly. Doesn't leave a metallic smell on your fingers. Fun to mess with. The only issue is that if you have small hands as I do, it's hard to have it not catch on the web between one's thumb and forefinger. Most people won't have that problem, though =)
customer_reviews.author: Taracinablue

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Helpful and Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: I've been dealing with severe anxiety for several weeks and have been looking for some kind of totem to help with grounding, distraction, and physical movement. This little thing is awesome and powerful! It's definitely helped lower my anxiety in just a few days. It's quiet, smooth, and the force you feel while using it is unique from other similar items. One drawback - the main grip points have started to slowly unscrew from each other after using it for a while. It's easy to screw tighter to secure; but something to note and why I can't give 5 stars. Otherwise, very much worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked cool
customer_reviews.text: The description and pictures of this spinner looked really cool! I've had it for a bit now and although I've enjoyed it none of my kids have. Pros: It's unique and can be a nice focus while paying attention to spinning it. Cons: Only works while holding it. Does not work to spin on a surface which is ok as that kinda defeats the purpose of a spinner.
customer_reviews.author: B Porter

customer_reviews.title: Kind of shoddy
customer_reviews.text: The counterweight is loosely-fitted onto its pivot. During spin it slides down until the counterweight (easily the heaviest part of the entire thing) hits the arm holding it in place, preventing it from spinning any more. I can't see a way to fix it. Huge waste of money as it isn't good at the only job it had - spinning.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Best Fidget spinner for anxiety
customer_reviews.text: This is our second fidget spinner of this type. The last one we used daily till it finally broke. It’s by far the best one for anxiety that we have found. it fits perfect in your fingers and has a little weight to it which is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lakisha

customer_reviews.title: My go-to fidget toy
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased every type of fidget toy out there but I use this one more than any of them. I never leave the house without it. Regular spinners are boring but this one is more interactive which is what I personally need in a fidget toy. My coworkers are always asking if they can borrow it. :P I've purchased 3 of them (only because I keep losing them) and I haven't had a single issue or quality concern with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Highly Recommended for Adults!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really solidly built and well made fidget spinner. The weight is a perfect balance and feels very comfortable in my hands. I’m maybe spending too much time trying to get the gears in sinc with each other at times :) it’s fun to play with too! I’m definitely enjoying mine! Also wanted to point out that the shipping was fast and arrived on time which I really appreciate so feel it should be mentioned. Well packaged too! I hope you enjoy yours too!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great office toy!
customer_reviews.text: I keep this on my desk at work and the amount of people that pick it up and play with it is crazy. I noticed it went missing one day and the manager brought it out of his office saying 'sorry, I didn't mean to keep it'. So much for keeping the interoffice germs down, though! Nobody can keep their hands off of it.
customer_reviews.author: bookwerm85

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have spent plenty of money on cheap fidget objects. This is one that is definitely worth a few dollars more to have. It feels solid and quickly becomes a mindless thing to spin. I love it, twiddle and bike chains. Worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Z

customer_reviews.title: Interesting!
customer_reviews.text: As much as I find it difficult to make both parts soon simultaneously, my son made it a personal challenge and was able to work it. He actually really enjoys it. He has ADD so watching him focus on manipulating the parts is a good way to focus. I feel this seems to work better than typical fidget spinners because of the different components that stimulate focus and concentration.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for people with longer fingers.
customer_reviews.text: Great Fidget Spinner for adults or children with long fingers. My fingers are a little short, so the second spinner on the end hits my hand when it spins. It is great quality though. It's a little different than most Fidget Spinners so it's fun to play with and it spins very smoothly. And it's the perfect size and shape to slip right into your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette B.

customer_reviews.title: Great (spinner) thing!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Was a little wobbly out of the box. Gave it a poor review... UPDATE- now a couple weeks later, I love this thing! Started spinning smoothly after a few days of use. Great conversation piece, hardly anyone stops by my desk without picking it up and looking at it like it’s from some secret government lab LOL. Same question all the time: “what is this thing?” It’s a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Honestly...

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, smooth
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a fidget spinner that can spin around just by a flick of the wrist. This is really smooth and glides effortlessly. It's definitely calming and this has been my favorite spinner so far. Mine has come apart a few times but it's not too hard to put back together. The pieces just click right back in. I'm a college student and many of my friends and a couple of professors thought this was childish, but I convinced some of them to take a whirl and they reluctantly agreed that it felt gratifying. I'll likely buy a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: 2 bigger circles may come apart
customer_reviews.text: my daughter has ADHD and the teacher recommended something to fidget with. we found this. the 2 circular pieces you need to screw together and can come apart which is kind of a pain. but overall we are pleased with this produc
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy, high quality spinner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a week ago and have been very pleased. This spinner is made of a high quality, durable, stainless steel material. It’s the perfect size and weight to fidget with and makes little to no noise when it’s spinning. The design offers a very satisfying feel when the different components are spinning. Overall, the high quality, unique design, fast, smooth spin, and reasonable price makes this a great, fun item to purchase. No regrets and highly recommend this as a great spinner to add to any collection.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: Lots more fun than a regular spinner
customer_reviews.text: I like this thing a lot. The standard spinners bore me, but since this one has an erratic additional piece on the end, it's more soothing and entertaining. I like to spin it slowly, let the short piece bump my palm, and watch how it reacts in what looks like confused momentum. I keep it at work for when I'm thinking through a problem. Comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Solumadur

customer_reviews.title: Unusual - well built
customer_reviews.text: This is a fascinating change from the standard spinner fidgets commonly found all over the place. I am still working out how best to spin it, and how to get the pattern just right. At times it follows a specific spinning rhythm, and then it goes and does its own thing. Took me a while to figure it out, but now I can keep it going with just miniscule movements. I like the construction of this device - seems very rugged and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: FluffpuppypupTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: It’s different
customer_reviews.text: I love this weird fidget spinner! It takes a short while to be able to manipulate it to it’s best function, but is well worth it. Truly chaotic, and yet pleasant. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fidget spinner. I bought this one when I returned a different fidget device due to quality issues. There are no quality issues with this. It is enjoyable and achieves the goal. I also enjoy watching people get frustrated before I show them how to make it properly spin.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Way more than just a mindless spinning object
customer_reviews.text: The figit is a double pendulum, which has very unique chaotic type of motions. Only negative is that it is highly machined ltem and can be damaged like I did to my first one because I sat on it.
customer_reviews.author: hanke

customer_reviews.title: Interesting new invention
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as my prior fidget spinner broke. This is like nothing I've ever seen before and it's pretty interesting to try. They give you notes for how to use it and it's pretty fun to use. It's slightly heavier than I anticipated but just shows it's better made than the cheap plastic ones I've purchased in the past. I'd recommend this product for anyone who loves a fidget spinner.
customer_reviews.author: PhotosbyJennRoberts

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is different from most fidget spinners on the market. it is asymetrical, which makes it more interesting to fidget with. It is well made. It doesn't feel cheap. Overall, I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Very Creative Spinner.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very interesting spinner, one of a kind. It’s the double pendulum from chaos theory, a really interesting idea to be put together into a little toy like these. It is well made of metallic materials, sure is gonna last a while. The mechanism is also very smooth, which is always a plus. Overall a cool toy to have when I am waiting in line or just chilling at home.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It came apart and pieces were lost in the grass within the first 20 minutes of handing it to my 10yo child. It just shouldn’t come apart so easily. I wouldn’t give this to a little kid who might put it in their mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Lockwood Donley

customer_reviews.title: REALLY RELIEVES MY ANXIETY!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this for my 10yr old son but I can't get over how much it helps with my anxiety! Turns out my son rathers the orbiter ball fidget toy I also purchased instead so looks like I can keep my fidget toy!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Allbritton

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves it, and I find myself sitting there playing with it from time to time. Awesome fidget spinner that isn’t a typical fidget spinner.
customer_reviews.author: Masha

customer_reviews.title: Its a FANTASTIC and addictive toy!
customer_reviews.text: This strange momentum spinning thing is great, its like a more respected version of a fidget spinner, and with enough imagination when its folded up on its side it doubles as a tiny space car. Its super sturdy and great material. One side does tend to slightly unscrew sometimes when in my pocket for a while, but you simply twist it back in place. Highly reccomend it - got 4 of my coworkers to buy it within 30 seconds of playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Accelsier

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is too expensive. I like it as a fidget toy. I was looking for something quiet and easy to have in my car - to relax while stuck in traffic. It does the trick, but I'm really bummed it costs so much. I would say, ultimately, it wasn't worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Bibby

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and works as presented
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit long to be held in the thumb and forefinger without the small lobe hitting the palm. Maybe with lots of trial time.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin B.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect and fun you can move it multiple ways so it actually keeps your brain working it does take a little getting use too but that is all part of the fun!
customer_reviews.author: SammieJo5

customer_reviews.title: Interesting.
customer_reviews.text: This product is so nice. I bought this because I saw other people play with this, very interesting, this is little difficult to play than the ordinary one, but once you get used to it, you will not willing to stop. Fascinating. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kairen

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly addicting
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time for conferences, phone calls or sitting at my desk, its a mindless habit however the weight and feel is VERY satisfying
customer_reviews.author: angelacao

customer_reviews.title: I like it.  It's really a rare toy.
customer_reviews.text: A unique restless toy with machined handles and arms that are not easy to break. With two precision bearings, the rotation is very smooth, there will not be a very sinking and motionless phenomenon. Perfect for stress relief. With it, I will become calm, and I can kill time when I am bored. I like it. It's really a rare toy.
customer_reviews.author: Cayleigh Overlin

customer_reviews.title: Great for Fidgeters!
customer_reviews.text: This fidget spinner is great! It is durable and made well. It spins nicely and is fun to play with. If you're looking for a different kind of fidget spinner, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Michaele D

customer_reviews.title: Best fidget toy ever
customer_reviews.text: This is fun and addictive. I have used many variation of fidget toys and this one is so much fun! The build quality is great too
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Coolest ever
customer_reviews.text: Coolest fidget ever. Partner carries it everywhere and gets comments on it, it tajesd focus which takes your mind off anxiety. A little too expensive but eh, could swing it so did.
customer_reviews.author: Redsox9

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t spin for long.  Not balanced.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t actually spin in a way that is satisfying for a spinner you’d like to enjoy. Unfortunately for those expecting an actual perpetual spinner
customer_reviews.author: joMamma

customer_reviews.title: sloppy machining
customer_reviews.text: Does not achieve advertised spin times, bearings noisy, surfaces that should be parallel are not and construction quality feels poor. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Best Fidget Spinner Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have several fidget toys and this is my favorite! It spins smoothly and quietly. If you can only get 1 fidget toy, get this one! It makes a great gift too!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina K

customer_reviews.title: Great fidget
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite fidgets. It’s great to take to work. Fits well in your pocket. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Edison Oliveira Jr

customer_reviews.title: Suppressed the urge to lose his temper.
customer_reviews.text: The product quality is very good, is the kind of hardness is very good, will not rust, the detail processing is very good, will not hurt the finger. There are two bearings inside that rotate very flexibly. When you are upset, you come out to play for a while, which greatly suppresses the impulse to lose your temper. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Stevie rufo

customer_reviews.title: Cool and different not built for speed
customer_reviews.text: The trick is to move it slowly and control the movement. Takes finesse to get the hang of it. Not true spinner. The fun is trying to control the “chaotic” movement
customer_reviews.author: jtm215

customer_reviews.title: Kinda hard to spin but I like iut
customer_reviews.text: Little scraping as it spins and is a little difficult to get the hand of but all in all its a nice little fidget .
customer_reviews.author: Mike E

customer_reviews.title: Much more interesting that a traditional spinner
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the office while I'm in meetings, etc. It helps me think to have a gadget in my hands. The double pendulum motion works great. Much more interesting than a traditional fidget spinner.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Very Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Pretty quiet, I was looking for something that would not disturb my sons classmates. It’s not perfect but pretty close to quiet. It has not been a distraction for the class and my son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The packaging in this was the best part. The poor translation had me in tears. Product was good.
customer_reviews.author: jayna122586

customer_reviews.title: Excellent concept, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of asymmetrical spinner and expected more. Possible improvements - Increase spinning speed (so that it's as fast as conventional fidget spinners on Amazon) - At least one more holding spot for variety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner :D

customer_reviews.title: A finger spinner for adults that doesn't look like a toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband, he loves it and carrots it around with him while working from home. :)
customer_reviews.author: S. A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice balance with counter
customer_reviews.text: Fun little piece. Easy to keep variable patterns with counter swing. Nice weight to it, smooth rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cross

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool for fidgeting or just killing time!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, different than your every day spinners, many ways to master, great fidget tool, top quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. Madl

customer_reviews.title: Seller sent replacement, much better but...
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart within 3 days of purchasing it. Was very rough to spin when it first got to me, not satisfying at all. Bad buy. Update: Seller was happy to send me a replacement, this one is much smoother and isn't nearly as flimsy. They said they've changed manufacturers, which would explain the increase in quality. This is what I expected to buy, just a shame it's not what I got when I initially purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Turner

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but somewhat expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: It is a great toy to fidget with, but probably not worth the 17 bucks it is on here. I'm sure it's only pricey because it is made of metal, but other than that it is amazingly fun to play with and is easy to use in my non dominant hand while writing on school. Beware, however, because your forearm will get tired after about 30-45 mins of continuous spinning!
customer_reviews.author: Rohit Gogineni

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lot of fun. I have OCD and this helps with my fidgety. I enjoy this a lot and helps me to calm down and concentrate. Plus it’s not boring to play since it can be played in so many ways, not just what the videos are showing. 😊 it feels so solid and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Different kind of fidget!
customer_reviews.text: Interesting fidget that arrived in a silky gift bag. Comes apart in two pieces and can be put back together. Its unique design might appeal to those who enjoy fidgets, but there is a learning curve and not recommended for 5yrs or younger. My son has adhd and enjoys it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Davis

customer_reviews.title: My favorite fidget!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and fun to fidget with, I like that there's multiple ways to fidget with it to keep it interesting!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: No!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Didn’t work well. Seemed cheaply made. Sent mine back.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: neat spin on a fidget spinner
customer_reviews.text: This is well built. It works great. I thought It was going to do a little bit more due to the extra attachments but It doesn’t matter what I want because my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in Love!
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today, so I can't speak to durability, but it feels amazing, is super smooth an I'm in love already <3 :D
customer_reviews.author: Ciarra D.

customer_reviews.title: I hope it can help you, too
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm not an optimist. A lot of times I always feel depressed and sad. Whenever this time, I always want to vent, but I can't find the right way or object to talk to. I'll use this gadget, maybe psychologically, but I find I'm calming down. Slowly began to work, study. I recommend it and hope it can help you
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Captivating fidget
customer_reviews.text: I have several fidgets but this is my favorite, go-to fidget. It keeps me from picking at hangnails and making my fingers sore.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: But not by again boring
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty lame compared to a fidget spinner and just doesn’t offer much satisfaction
customer_reviews.author: woody3006

customer_reviews.title: Unique!
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a well made spinner. Very unique to my collection. I like it so much, I’m ordering two more for other family members
customer_reviews.author: classical4strings

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to help with quitting smoking
customer_reviews.text: My husband is quitting smoking and this helps him keep his hands busy and avoid thinking about smoking
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: New design for a fidget spinner
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try out this newer design for the fidget spinner. It is like a double pendulum basically. It is very smooth but it certainly doesn't feel like the usual fidget spinners.
customer_reviews.author: Saurabh

customer_reviews.title: The effect is very good
customer_reviews.text: The effect is very good, when upset, put it in the hand to play for a while. At the beginning, I thought it could sink. Would I play for a while and hurt my wrist. The result is that I think too much, not heavy at all. The rotation is very flexible
customer_reviews.author: Monica Stelkic

customer_reviews.title: I like this toy. So I recommend
customer_reviews.text: When you are free, you often put it in your hand to play, subconsciously you will relax yourself. It's very light and smooth. It doesn't grind and can't rotate. I like this toy. So I recommend that you can also buy to try
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dao

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is a very unique spinner! really love it! addictive!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Still fun
customer_reviews.text: Love mine. I've had it for a while(about a year) don't play with it as much as I use to but still keeps me entertained for a bit when I do
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: excellent except
customer_reviews.text: except the wheels come off easily and may get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Cbewtra

product_meta.title: Anti-Anxiety Fidget Spinner, Fidget Hand Toys Focus Finger Spinning Toy for Kid and Adult Relieving Stress Boredom ADHD Autism
product_meta.description:
Play with Duomishu New Fidget Spinner, spin when you are bored, anxious, or have to focus on something, get stress out of your life!

Your Pocket Buddy
Extremely portable and pocket size which is easy to carry, play anytime, anywhere. Build your concentration, put stress and anxiety at bay, or just enjoy some fun play time by unleashing your helpful pocket buddy!

Perfect Gift Choice
Suitable for Adults and kids over 10 years old and the beautiful high-quality retail packaging included makes our fidget spinner the ideal present for any family member or for your friends.

Specifications:
Material: Stainless Steel
Product Weight: 35g
Folded Size: 17mm x 20mm x 48mm
Fully Extended Size: 17mm x 20mm x 52.5mm

Package Includes:
1 * Fidget Spinner
1 * Gift box
1 * User manual

Note:
The fully extended dimension is the required clearance you need from the point of grip to the inside of your hand.
You can use it if your hand is smaller than this but when spinning fully extended it may contact your palm.
feature_bullets: ★ NEWEST STYLE - The most unique fidget toy ever, based on the theory of the double pendulum and random motion (Chaos Theory). It means the movements are unique and follow different paths each time you spin.

★ VERY FUN - The ways of fidgeting with this fidget spinner are endless. You can flick it, let it drop and spin, balance horizontal while small movements make large unpredictable results, generate endless spins by perpetual motion, spin 1 or both arms and many more.

★ DURABLE - Full stainless steel construction, machined grips and arms, not easy to break when falling off; 2 hybrid ceramic precision bearings are used in the design of the Pendulum. This gives ultra-smooth spins and friction less rotation.

★ KILLER OF STRESS -- Great for releasing anxiety, relaxing, staying awake, ADHD, ADD, autism and other attention disorder issues. Helps you calm down while stressful, kill you time while you are boring.

★Perfect Gift Choice --Suitable for Adults and kids over 10 years old and the beautiful high-quality retail packaging included makes our fidget spinner the ideal present for any family member or for your friends.
